ComicInfo.Summary:
“THE LAST TWO BROTHERS IN THE WORLD”
The finals days of the Armageddon draw near.
Hollywood News: Amazon Studios has put in development as an hourlong genre drama series from Jonathan Hickman. He is teaming with Robert Kirkman who will executive produce via Skybound Entertainment’s first-look deal. The show will be created and executive produced by Hickman and Nick Dragotta and written by Hickman. Also executive producing alongside Skybound’s Kirkman will be Dave Alpert, Sean Furst, and Bryan Furst (Dice).

ComicInfo.Title: To the Victor, Goes Everything
